// Use in the xui-wizard template to indicate where you want the summary step to be transcluded.
// You must provide the property on the xui-wizard controller that will hold the transcluded element
// <div class="xui-wizard">
//   <div xui-wizard-summary-transclude="summaryTranscluded"></div>
//   ...
// </xui-wizard>
export default class WizardSummaryTransclude implements ng.IDirective {
    public require = "^xuiWizard";
    public link = (scope:ng.IScope, element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery,
                   attr:ng.IAttributes, controller:any) => {
        scope.$watch(
            () => controller[attr["xuiWizardSummaryTransclude"]],
            (heading:ng.IAugmentedJQuery) => {
                if (heading) {
                    element.html("");
                    element.append(heading);
                }
            });
    };
}
